Html:
Is it possible to have some sample commands posted somewhere on this site, I tried running the 'help' function mentioned on the releases page for this project, and receive a "Unrecognized token in source text.  -- Line3 Cahr12  get-help @ <<<< args -EA "SilentlyContinue" -Full:$Full" on the 3rd line 12th character (the @ symbol).
I'm not sure what that is all about, but if there were some samples posted here that would help a ton.

thanks for your time.

(note: My current challenge is sending mouse clicks, the cmdlet appears to be selecting the window properly, but not sending the actual click to the window.
The line in question is
send-click 1969676 -Button Left -X 20 -Y 50
Where 1969676 is the handle for the desired window to click on)

Hello,

I looked through the usage examples.

Very helpful.

However how do you send a down arrow key?

Any help with that would be appreciated.

Also love the snapin works great!

Found the answer myself but thought I'd post it here as well to help others.
